messages.subject: Re: Subject: Yu-Gi-Oh
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Terri, Just catching up so I dont know if you have gotten the info you re looking for but I asked my son who is 14 and a big Yu-Gi-Oh.  He suggested getting
messages.messageBody:
Hi Terri,
Just catching up so I dont know if you have gotten the info you're looking
for but I asked my son who is 14 and a big Yu-Gi-Oh. He suggested getting a
structure deck either one called Fury from the Deep and/or Blaze of
Destruction he says these are better than the starter decks but if you wanted a starter
deck he suggested Kaiba Evolution. He also said that each deck comes with a
rule book.
Also if your son wanted to and if it was ok with you he could either email
or IM my son with any questions etc.
Feel free to email if you would like
Lisa



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
